resources.string: I am a mental health professional with clinical training, and I have a strong passion for research, mentoring, and strength-based approaches to mental health. My quick learning curve, dedication to my clients, and nonjudgmental outlook, in my opinion, will all contribute to my ability to forge effective therapeutic relationships. I am a good listener and I think that compassion and respect are crucial in therapy. Regaining your focus and feeling like your best self is my aim for you! My ability to create a treatment plan that is unique for each client is my main strength.
